column1: name: string (the name of the department

column2: if the department is a sub-department, this should reference the parent department's id
column3: the parent department must be defined in the CSV file before any department that references it)

column1: manager_id: string (the manager of the department
column2: should reference an employee's id from the employee records)

column1: note: string (a description or note about the department
column2: optional field that can include details about the department's function or responsibilities)
